Index.meta_title: Pixel Capture - Perfect screenshot tool with pixel-perfect precision.
Index.meta_description: Pixel Capture is a powerful browser extension that lets you capture screenshots with custom dimensions and pixel-perfect accuracy. Ideal for designers, developers and content creators.

Hero.description: Pixel Capture is a powerful browser extension that lets you capture screenshots with custom dimensions and pixel-perfect accuracy. Ideal for designers, developers and content creators.

Features.section_title: Unlock the Full Potential of Pixel Capture
Features.section_description: Pixel Capture is a powerful browser extension that provides precise screenshot experience.
Features.feature1_description: Precisely control the width and height of your screenshots, customizing dimensions to your specific needs.
Features.feature2_description: Ensure every pixel is perfectly accurate, capturing exactly what you need, no more and no less.
Features.feature3_description: Capture screen content with just a few clicks, saving your valuable working time.
Features.feature4_description: Automatically save your screenshots to the cloud, easily access and manage all your historical captures.
Features.feature5_description: Support for PNG, JPG, WebP, and PDF export formats to meet different requirements.
Features.feature6_description: Synchronize your screenshots across different devices, accessing all your content anywhere, anytime.

Pricing.section_title: Choose the Plan That's Right for You
Pricing.section_description: Whether you need basic screenshot functionality or advanced features like PDF exports, we have a plan for you.

FAQ.section_description: Find answers to common questions about Pixel Capture.
FAQ.question1: What is Pixel Capture and how does it work?
FAQ.answer1: Pixel Capture is a browser extension that allows you to take precise screenshots with custom dimensions. It works by overlaying a measurement tool on your screen, letting you select exact areas to capture, and then providing various export options including PNG, JPG, WebP, and PDF formats.
FAQ.question2: What makes Pixel Capture different from regular screenshot tools?
FAQ.answer2: Unlike standard screenshot tools, Pixel Capture offers pixel-perfect precision with customizable dimensions, making it ideal for designers and developers who need exact measurements. It also provides cloud storage, multi-device synchronization, and supports multiple export formats including PDF.
FAQ.question3: Do I need to create an account to use Pixel Capture?
FAQ.answer3: The basic features of Pixel Capture can be used without an account. However, to access cloud storage, synchronization across devices, and PDF export capabilities, you'll need to create an account and subscribe to our Pro plan.
FAQ.question4: Can I use Pixel Capture on multiple browsers?
FAQ.answer4: Currently, Pixel Capture is available as a Chrome extension. We're working on supporting other browsers like Firefox, Safari, and Edge in future updates. With a Pro account, you can sync your screenshots across different devices using the same browser.
FAQ.question5: What's the difference between the Free and Pro plans?
FAQ.answer5: The Free plan gives you access to basic screenshot functionality with PNG, JPG, and WebP formats, along with 2GB of storage. The Pro plan ($1.99/month) adds PDF export capability, increases storage to 10GB, and provides priority email support.
FAQ.question6: How secure are my screenshots in the cloud?
FAQ.answer6: We take security seriously. All screenshots stored in our cloud are encrypted both in transit and at rest. We use industry-standard security practices, and your data is never shared with third parties without your explicit permission.

Roadmap.section_description: See what features are currently available and what we're working on next.
Roadmap.feature1_description: Capture screenshots in PNG format with transparency support for high-quality images.
Roadmap.feature2_description: Save screenshots in JPG format with adjustable compression for smaller file sizes.
Roadmap.feature3_description: Export screenshots in WebP format for modern web-optimized images with better compression.
Roadmap.feature4_description: Convert your screenshots directly to PDF format for easy sharing and documentation.
Roadmap.feature5_description: Store your screenshots securely in the cloud and access them from anywhere.
Roadmap.feature6_description: Support for Firefox browser to reach more users across different platforms.
Roadmap.feature7_description: Expand our platform to Safari users on macOS and iOS devices.
Roadmap.feature8_description: Bring Pixel Capture to Microsoft Edge users for a complete cross-browser experience.
